feedback.aiSummary: The speaker vaguely mentions an intention to translate something, but the speech is too short and lacks context to understand the message fully.
feedback.constructiveTip: Focus on expanding your ideas and providing more context for your audience to understand the purpose of your message. Practice speaking slower and with intention, minimizing filler words and focusing on conveying a clear and concise message from beginning to end.
strengths: Speaker initiated a speech, showing willingness to communicate.

improvements: Develop a clear and concise message with a specific purpose.
